column2: Tindak Malaysia (2024), Warta Kerajaan 1st April 1976 and 27th May 1976, Laporan Pilihan Raya Umum  Dewan Undangan Negeri Sabah, Tahun 1976, Suruhanjaya Pilihan Raya  Refer to 1976_Other_Sources for other source files

According to Straits Times 27/7/1975, Sabah Alliance (USNO - SCA) was deemed withdrawn from Barisan Nasional on 22/1/1975. However, there was a denial from Deputy Defense Minister, Datuk Dzulkfili Hamid on 24/7/1975 that Sabah Alliance withdrawn from Barisan Nasional. Some sources claimed Berjaya joined BN in August 1975.  Other sources stated that Berjaya and USNO (for readmission) was brought into Barisan Nasional in June 1976. Users are to make their own judgement in studying categorization of USNO, SCA and Berjaya. Following candidates where the sex category require more validation - Sumi Bhatt (Berjaya), Kok Fung Chong (Pekemas), Wee Eng Leong (Pekemas) and Tam Ah Ken (Independent). TindakMalaysia Network Services PLT is not responsible for any errors or ommissions arising from the original data or its derivatives.
